sentences.sentence: Proxy solicitations have a so called double-edged sword effect.
sentences.translation: 委托书征集对公司治理具有“双刃剑”效应。

sentences.sentence: Those kinds of solicitations are not something many of us in the nonprofit world hear very often-or would understand.
sentences.translation: 这一种的募捐和我们在非营利组织的世界中听到的，或者通常理解的，很不一样。

sentences.sentence: Because fund raising is so expensive, the nonprofit will probably end up spending more money on future solicitations than you're worth.
sentences.translation: 现在基金涨到这么高，你很可能因为金融市场的美好前景的诱惑而投入了过多数量的钱但最终却无利可图。
